body.head.byline: By WINNIE HU (NYT); Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: New York City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn urges Mayor Michael R Bloomberg to reconsider ban on cellphones in public schools, saying working parents need to stay in touch with their children (S)

block.p: Council Speaker Christine C. Quinn urged Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg yesterday to reconsider a ban on cellphones in the public schools, saying that working parents in particular needed a way to stay in touch with their children during the school day. While the speaker agreed that cellphones should not be used in the classroom, she said that the mayor and Schools Chancellor Joel. I Klein should work with elected officials and parent groups to reach a compromise that would allow students to call their parents.
